issue.title: [R][CI] R nightly builds used old libarrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16899](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16899). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We had not set `ARROW_R_DEV` so there was no way to see that the builds where using an old libarrow version from rwinlib.
